name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/MLCi8x9fpx

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This year, in addition to their own demands, some protests also added demands to "meet the mayor":

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 26, Lai Ching-te expressed the hope that the public could understand why Taiwanese celebrities were forced to make political statements in mainland China.
"Under someone else's roof, what our cultural workers say is one thing, but what's more important is what they think in their hearts."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of May 27, Changzhi, Shanxi. A huge poster of a report was posted on the door of a hotel in Chenghuang Temple Scenic Area.
According to local netizens, the content of the poster was to report the court, and it was removed at 3 am.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, in Shanghai, a school bus with the words "Shanghai International Studies University Xianda School of Economics and Humanities" printed on it rammed into a Mazda sedan that was lying across the road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 26, in Xiaogan, Hubei, an urban management officer took off his clothes and kicked down an elderly vegetable seller in the street.
Local residents said that the elderly sell vegetables here every day. "If you ask me for details, we dare not tell you. We cannot afford to offend the urban management officer now. You know, we are not allowed to dry clothes now, and they will find trouble with us."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/xXv40jr7H5

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 27, Hua Chunying was appointed as Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs.
Currently, Hua Chunying is the youngest Minister of Foreign Affairs, the first Vice Minister born in the 1970s, and the only female in the current leadership of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, the Weibo topic #Double-day weekend and single-day weekend are really two different lives# became a hot search, sparking discussion and resonance among netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 26 (Release), Taiyuan, Shanxi. It was reported online that a female manager of Taiyuan Pifu Shabu Shabu City Restaurant organized several employees to tease a mentally retarded uncle, pour water on him, surround the old man, and beat the woman who was traveling with him.
According to an insider, the old man’s daughter-in-law died during working hours on the 18th, and the restaurant was not responsible, so the old man and his family came to the restaurant to seek an explanation, but were treated like this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 24, the Zhejiang Maritime Safety Administration announced that the Chinese tugboat "United Qirui" sank in the East China Sea and hoped that all ships would avoid it.
The official did not disclose the cause of the sinking. Although the location where the tugboat sank was not within the scope of the military exercise, it still caused a lot of speculation and discussion among netizens. Some netizens said "few words but big things"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/iBACFlVyss

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Gu Yan Mu Chan posted a video saying: Xinjiang workers can earn over 10,000 yuan a month, so why are the colonists who work for the West still earning 3,000 yuan a month?
This caused netizens to complain

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, "Experts say housing prices in big cities may rise sharply in the next few years" became a hot search. Netizens urged experts to buy more.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Just now, Shaoxing No. 1 Middle School reported that
Xu had made inappropriate remarks in class.
After research and decision by the school party committee, the teacher's teaching work will be suspended from today, he will be transferred from the teaching position, and given a warning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Ministry of Public Security held a press conference on May 27 to introduce that my country is one of the countries with the lowest homicide rate, the lowest criminal crime rate, and the fewest gun violence cases in the world.
This triggered a lot of ridicule from netizens, who called for a reduction in the number of police officers given the safety of the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, in Tongling, Anhui, a building on one side of Building 48 in Longyuan Community collapsed, and rescue work was underway at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 26, Dongguan, Guangdong. Weiya Electronics Factory closed down and owed employees wages. Workers protested in the factory to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 26, Yuncheng, Shanxi. Villagers in Zhaoxing Village, Chengbei District, Guopingdian protested against the local government's construction of a crematorium around their chicken farm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, Shanghai issued the "Notice on Optimizing the Policies and Measures for the Stable and Healthy Development of the City's Real Estate Market". The social security period for non-hukou residents was adjusted to three years, and the areas where non-Shanghai talents and non-Shanghai singles can buy houses in key areas were expanded. Families with two or more children can purchase one more house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 27, in Xuzhou, Jiangsu, at the Artron International Advertising Industry Expo, an exhibitor held a megaphone and shouted for a refund.
The exhibitor said that the exhibition advertised 20,000 visitors, but the actual number was less than 2,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 27, a student jumped from a building near Daoyang College at the Shenzhen campus of the Chinese University of Hong Kong. At present, ambulances and police cars have arrived, and the scene of the incident is blocked by umbrellas.
According to students on campus, the forum app they often use has been deleting posts about this matter, and now the system maintenance has been directly started.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, JD.com said that the public security authorities had recently uncovered a "black public relations" case against JD.com. I hope everyone will not believe in rumors or spread them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos on June 4th. Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 15 (May 27)
[Hong Kong’s “Democracy Sings to China” raises NT$120,000 to aid Beijing students] [Students announced to evacuate the square on the 30th]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, Long County, Shaanxi. Xuanyuan Impression Longzhou real estate was delayed in delivery, and the owners shouted at the county government, "Li Weifang (Deputy Secretary of the County Party Committee), come downstairs!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 27, Nanning, Guangxi.
The developer of Xingguang Vegetable Market sold shops to the public knowing that the buildings were illegal. There were five or six companies responsible for the development and operation of the vegetable market, and there were also equity acquisition and entrusted operation relationships between them.
Dissatisfied owners put up banners in the vegetable market to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, 1989, Hong Kong stars expressed their support for Beijing students at the "Democracy Songs for China" event.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/MUWI55yiDl

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The forum has now been restored and students have begun to express their condolences indirectly

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 20, a random murder occurred in a park in Chenzhou, Hunan, resulting in 3 deaths and 2 injuries.
The 3 victims were not acquainted with the suspect and were killed while walking in the park.

name: 李老师不是你老师
